remarks: A faithful functor reflects epimorphisms.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 27-Jan-2017.)
statement:
fthmon.b $e |- B = ( Base ` C ) $.
fthmon.h $e |- H = ( Hom ` C ) $.
fthmon.f $e |- ( ph -> F ( C Faith D ) G ) $.
fthmon.x $e |- ( ph -> X e. B ) $.
fthmon.y $e |- ( ph -> Y e. B ) $.
fthmon.r $e |- ( ph -> R e. ( X H Y ) ) $.
fthepi.e $e |- E = ( Epi ` C ) $.
fthepi.p $e |- P = ( Epi ` D ) $.
fthepi.1 $e |- ( ph -> ( ( X G Y ) ` R ) e. ( ( F ` X ) P ( F ` Y ) ) ) $.
fthepi $p |- ( ph -> R e. ( X E Y ) ) $.
